text: Norbert Bonvecchio (born 14 August 1985) is an Italian athlete specialising in the javelin throw. Earlier in his career, he competed in the high jump.2016 EC bio His personal best in the event is 80.37 metres, set in Braunschweig in 2014. ==International competitions== {| |- !colspan="6"|Representing |- |rowspan=2|2013 |Mediterranean Games |Mersin, Turkey |6th |Javelin throw |72.55 m |- |Universiade |Kazan, Russia |9th |Javelin throw |75.28 m |- |2014 |European Championships |Zürich, Switzerland |30th (q) |Javelin throw |69.38 m |- |rowspan=2|2016 |European Cup Winter Throwing |Arad, Romania |bgcolor=silver|2nd |Javelin throw |76.66 m |- |European Championships |Amsterdam, Netherlands |24th (q) |Javelin throw |75.75 m |} ==Seasonal bests by year== *2008 - 70.23 *2009 - 70.74 *2011 - 75.52 *2012 - 79.22 *2013 - 77.78 *2014 - 80.37 *2015 - 79.45 *2016 - 79.21 *2017 – 79.80 *2018 – 70.93 *2019 – 73.22 *2020 – 74.64 ==References== Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male javelin throwers Category:Competitors at the 2013 Summer Universiade
title: Norbert Bonvecchio
